mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES( #{userId},#{password},#{userName},#{gender}, #{age},#{email},#{phone},#{address}, #{hobby, typeHandler=strArray}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET username=#{userName}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, hobby=#{hobby,typeHandler=strArray} where userid=#{userId}
